document.heading: Triangle Community Garden Equitable Real Estate Property Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-153, the “Triangle Community Garden Equitable Real Estate Property Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-647 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 2, 2006, and June 6, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 26, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-394 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-153 became effective on September 19, 2006.
